text:
District Collector A.Gnanasekaran inaugurated a Direct Procurement Centre (DPC) at Narthampoondi village near here to mark the beginning of direct procurement of paddy from farmers at support price, in this district. Thenmozhi, Regional Manager, TamilNadu Civil Supply Corporation was present during the event.

According to sources Cooperative Department is planning to have more DPCs in the district in addition to those set up by Tamil Nadu Civil Supply Corporation.
title: Direct Procurement Centre inaugurated
